class  ReadInputDocumentTask

Detailed Description

This class represents the main frame of the application.

Author:
Salvo Danilo Giuffrida (giuffsalvo@hotmail.it, salvodanilogiuffrida@gmail.com)

Definition at line 67 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.DocumentClassifierView ( SingleFrameApplication  app  ) 

The input map associated with the JTable that visualizes the list of documents ranked to the current query is modified, so that when the user presses the key 'Enter' on an entry of the JTable, instead of the default behavior (scrolling to the next entry), a personalized one can be implemented.

I set the property 'UpdatePolicy' of the caret associated to the JTextArea 'textAreaOutput', which contains the status messages during the execution of the various tasks (scraping of the query document, classification, validation)

An event of type 'PreferenceChangeEvent' is forcefully generated (this class is a registered listener of it), to check what it the current chosen metric, and eventually change the label on the first column of the table, from "Cosine" to "Distance", in case the chosen metric is the Bhattacharrya distance

00165                     busyIconTimer.stop();

00167                     progressBar.setVisible(false);
00168                     progressBar.setValue(0);
00169                 } else if ("message".equals(propertyName)) {
00170                     String text = (String) (evt.getNewValue());
00171                     statusMessageLabel.setText((text == null) ? "" : text);
00172                 //messageTimer.restart();
00173                 } else if ("progress".equals(propertyName)) {
00174                     int value = (Integer) (evt.getNewValue());
00175                     progressBar.setVisible(true);
00176                     progressBar.setIndeterminate(false);
00177                     progressBar.setValue(value);
00178                 }
00179             }
00180         });

void documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.openDocument (  ) 

Action associated with the men entry File->Open: It shows a JFileChooser, used to choose from the local filesystem a query document to classify.

Definition at line 518 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

00518                                {
00519         try {
00520             if (fileChooser == null) {
00521                 fileChooser = new JFileChooser();
00522                 fileChooser.setCurrentDirectory(new File("."));
00523             }
00524             if (fileChooser.showOpenDialog(this.getComponent()) == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
00525                 fieldURL.setText(fileChooser.getSelectedFile().getCanonicalPath());
00526             }
00527         } catch (IOException ex) {
00528             showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00529         }
00530     }

void documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.openDocument ( String  path  )  throws Exception [private]

Method that opens a document (whose path is specified in input) in an external viewer.

path The path of the document that must be opened.

00540         //Desktop.getDesktop().browse(new URI(path));
00541         if (System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase().indexOf("windows") > -1) {
00542             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("cmd /c " + path);
00543         } else if (System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase().indexOf("mac") > -1) {
00544             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("open " + path);
00545         } else {
00546             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("firefox " + path);
00547         }
00548     }

When the user double clicks on one or more of the entries of the beforementioned list, this method handles the opening of the corresponding documents in an external viewer.

00558             int numberDoubleClicks = evt.getClickCount() / 2;
00559             if (numberDoubleClicks >= 1) {
00560                 for (int index : listDocuments.getSelectedRows()) {
00561                     String path = (String) infoDocuments.get(index).get("Path");
00562                     openDocument(path);
00563                 }
00564             }
00565         } catch (Exception ex) {
00566             showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00567         }
00568 }//GEN-LAST:event_clickDocuments

void documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.fieldURLCaretUpdate ( javax.swing.event.CaretEvent  evt  )  [private]

This method is called every time the caret of the JTextField containing the URL of the query document changes its position.

Parameters:
evt The CaretEvent generated every time the caret of the JTextField containing the URL of the query document changes its position (for example because of the insertion or deletion of characters from it).

Every time the position of the caret changes, the method controls if this event has been triggered by the removal or the insertion of characters in the JTextField. In case character have been removed, and the field has become empty, the property 'indirizzoValido', which controls the enabling of the task for scraping the current query document (LeggiDocumentoInputTask), is set to "false", otherwise to "true".

Definition at line 590 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

Referenced by documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.initComponents().

00602         setURLValid(false);
00603     }
00604 }//GEN-LAST:event_fieldURLCaretUpdate

void documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.preferenceChange ( PreferenceChangeEvent  evt  ) 

This method implements the interface PreferenceChangeListener, and is called every time that a value of a preferences node is removed or modified.

Parameters:
evt The PreferenceChangeEvent generated every time that a value of a preferences node is removed or modified.

The method first controls if the modified value is the one containing the name of the current metric or of the current scraper.

In the 1st case, the method changes the title of the 1st column in the JTable containing information about each document of the training set, ranked to the current query:

  • If the current metric is now TF-IDF, the name of the 1st column of the JTable is set to "Cosine".

  • Otherwise, if the current metric becomes the Bhattacharrya distance, that is set to "Distance".

The identifiers of the other two columns of the JTable (the 2nd and the 3rd) remain constant.

In the 2nd case, instead, the current scraper instance has been changed, therefore the property 'documentRead' (which controls the activation of OrdinaDocumentiTask, the classification task for the current document) is set to "false". This is done to force the user to read, with the new chosen scraper, the current query document, before trying to classify it.

Task documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.readInputDocument (  ) 

Action, and associated background task, to extract the title and text from the document whose URL has been specified in the JTextField, and which represents the current query. The action is enabled only if the property 'indirizzoValido' is set "true", something that happens only if the JTextField of the URL is not empty.

Returns:
A reference to the background task associated with the action.

Definition at line 771 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

00771                                     {
00772         currentTask=new ReadInputDocumentTask(application, fieldURL.getText());
00773         return currentTask;
00774     }

Task documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.rankDocuments (  ) 

Action, and associated background task, to rank the documents of the training set to the current query document. The action is enabled only if the property 'documentRead' is set to "true", that is if the query document has been correctly read from the URL provided in the JTextField.

Returns:
A reference to the background task associated with the action.

Definition at line 80 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

LinkedList<Map<String, Object> > documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.infoDocuments [private]

This is a list of maps 'String'->'Object', each one containing information on a document of the training set, and whose content is used when we want to visualize such information on the appropriate JTable after the ranking phase.

Definition at line 86 of file DocumentClassifierView.java.

Referenced by documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.DocumentClassifierView().

PreferencesDialog documentclassifier.DocumentClassifierView.preferencesDialog [private]

Each entry in the list aforementioned is made of a vector of objects containing information on a document of the training set (Bhattacharrya distance/Cosine of the angle with the query document, Category, Title), and a map that represents the document's histogram.
